ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I understood of the post on Fulcrum s site, these were found in a new version of the Prima EQ strategy guide.  I have the same Strategy guide but we
ygData.messageBody:
From what I understood of the post on Fulcrum's site, these were found in a
new version of the Prima EQ strategy guide. I have the same Strategy guide
but we got ours when EQ first came out so its old and VERY much outdated.
Seems kinda odd to me that Verant didnt put any hints or anything about
these in the game, only way we found out was by someone noticing them in a
strategy guide that Verant doesnt even do themselves.

Ziggi Phoenixflare, Logalog Puddlejumper
Level 49 Cleric of Tunare, Level 20 Wizard of Agnostica
Order of the Crimson Dragon,
Veeshan Server

-----Original Message-----

Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316

>Atinky Eveready
